<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invisible Trickster](/Feats.aspx?ID=2642) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have learned how to become invisible and remain so. You can cast 4th-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) as a primal innate spell once per hour.
name: Invisible Trickster
